Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: JABuna
Reviews.Content: I'm glad to be the first review. The phone's awesome. Came brand new in box. There's so much stuff to do that I'll probably never figure it all out. The seller was great too. Shipped in less than 12 hours (I ordered it at around midnight). Received the phone fast. Only problem is this seller was a little tough to find. I had to get pretty specific.All-in-all my experience was great and the phone is amazing!Thank you,John

Reviews.Title: Samsung Note 2
Reviews.Author: RC
Reviews.Content: Just As Advertised! New & In Perfect Condition.  Will Definitely Recommend This Buyer To Others And Will Definitely Be Purchasing Again.

Reviews.Title: really good device
Reviews.Author: Carlos M.
Reviews.Content: Great phone. Even though it was used it seemed brand new. Great Price too considering what other people sell it for.

Reviews.Title: Great Replacement Phone
Reviews.Author: Ericlovethings
Reviews.Content: Bought it when my Nokia Lumia broke and it has been phenomenal, minus the battery life, but that's more or less expected with the screen it has.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PHONE
Reviews.Author: DAVID COGSWELL
Reviews.Content: BETTER THAN I THOUGHT IT WOULD BE. IT GOT TO MY HOME FAST AND IT WAS EASY TO DO. THANK YOU.

Reviews.Title: Great Screen shots and Photos
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love everything about the phone...especially the screen shot feature.  Makes cropping so much easier.  And quality of the pictures is amazing.

Reviews.Title: not happy with defective rebuilt note2
Reviews.Author: CHERYL PAULSEN
Reviews.Content: Well I'm not to pleased to be honest with you. I love the phone. But it won't take updates when it tries like 10 times a day. It goes off and on out of nowhere. Annoying version has reset to factory 2 times got another sim card. They said it looks like the reader to the sim card doesn't work properly. But since I got it on amazon I'm just screwed. Feedback? Cheryl. 480 695-3160

Reviews.Title: It's terrific
Reviews.Author: whalea
Reviews.Content: I love my new phone i use to have an i phone but after the galaxy 2 I wouldn't want to go back

ProductInfo.Features:
The Samsung Galaxy Note II SCH-I605 blurs the line between phone and tablet, featuring a 5.5-inch Super AMOLED display, and an advanced stylus
This device features stylus-oriented software such as handwriting recognition and multiple exclusive apps for taking notes, sketching, and more
Other features of the Note II include 8-megapixel camera, 1.6GHz quad-core processor, 4G LTE data, 16GB internal memory, microSD slot, and global roaming capabilities
Use this device to access thousands of apps, games, movies, books, and music on Google's Play Store
This product has been extensively tested, is certified to be 100% functional, and ready for activation
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Galaxy Note 2 I605 Verizon CDMA Phone - Gray
